summary: 1999 FORD WINDSTAR, TRANSMISSION EXPERIENCED A COMPLETE FAILURE.  78,000 MILES, NO WARNING GIVEN. DEALER QUOTED $2500.00 FOR REBUILT TRANNY. AS I UNDERSTAND, THIS VEHICLE HAS BEEN PLAQUED WITH DRIVETRAIN PROBLEMS. I WOULD LIKE TO SEE FORD BE FORCED TO REPAIR/REPLACE/REIMBURSE OWNERS FOR REPAIRS THAT SHOULD HAVE NEVER BEEN NECESSARY.*JB
